job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's (BS in Computer Science) Or Master's (MS in Computer Science)

jd: From: Tarun Kumar, 3Ktechnologies tarunkumar.b@3ktechnologies.com Reply to: tarunkumar.b@3ktechnologies.com Role : Software Engineer for WFMLocation: San Jose, CA / Austin, TXJD: Over 10 years of proven experience in Java, Microservices and API integrations with vendor products.Design, develop, and maintain high-quality software solutions.Google Technology Stack Experience (Google3, Piper, Blaze, Git5/G4, Borg)Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.Troubleshoot and debug applications to ensure optimal performance.Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, implementation, and testing.Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously enhance our processes and products.Provide support to resolve bugs reported by the client.Strong programming ability in Python and should have developed web applications using Flask frameworkWeb application development in HTML, CSS, and JavaScriptKnowledge of SQL, relational databases and other data storage solutionsAngular JS and Material / Cane JS / similar JS frameworkUNIX/Linux environmentsFamiliarity in Version control systems and a Unix development environmentStrong ability to communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively, with fluency in English. Responsibilities:Gather requirements for integrating client applications with the Verint WFM 15.2 platform.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and integrate solutions with Verint WFM 15.2.Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for all developments and integrations related to Verint WFM 15.2 configurations and processes.Advise and assist the team and testers with testing and bug fixing.
